title: AI Experts Unveil Humpty Dumpty Logic in Linguistic Complexities of the Ukraine Conflict
description: In a world where the rhetoric surrounding geopolitical conflicts reaches a fever pitch, AI experts, akin to linguistic archaeologists, have turned their attention to the subjective use of language by politicians and pundits. They meticulously dissect the subjective use of terms like “enemy” and “investment,” peeling back the layers of meaning that dominate discussions on ... Read more

title: How Can We Help Shape Tomorrow’s Digital World With AI Ethics and Bias Regulations? – Exclusive Report
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) has swiftly transitioned from fantasy to an integral part of our modern world, influencing everything from online interactions to healthcare choices. However, as AI cements in our daily lives, ethically developing and deploying it becomes undeniably crucial. Just as humans have inherent biases, the technology we craft, notably AI, can mirror and ... Read more
